downloadTitle: Windows Internet Naming Service Management Pack 2000, 2003 Management Pack for Operations Manager 2007
downloadDescription: Collects WINS events in the Windows 2000, and Windows Server 2003 system event logs. Highlights events that may indicate service outages, or configuration problems.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Windows WINS 2003 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/0/5/f05089fa-4377-4165-aa4e-c5d81c434727/Microsoft Windows WINS 2003 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi

detailsSection:
The WINS Management Pack collects WINS events in the Windows 2000, and Windows Server 2003 system event logs. This management pack highlights events that may indicate service outages or configuration problems.

Requires OpsMgr 2007 MOM 2005 Backward Compatibility MP Update) 6.0.5000.12 (or higher)

Release History:
Initial Release for OpsMgr 2007 8/31/2007 Version 6.0.5000.0
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Windows WINS 2003 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
Required Software:
System Center Operations Manager 2007,
Windows Internet Naming Service (WINS) 2000, 2003
OpsMgr 2007 MOM 2005 Backward Compatibility MP Update 6.0.5000.12 (or higher)
